text: 10.42: Mt 18.5-6 naŋga, 25.40 naŋga, Mk 9.41 naŋga, Hi 6.10Kru mumɨŋga ambɨrɨmandɨ. Yi kukumɨni Jisasɨndu sɨmbɨrasara ñiŋgiñɨndu ñɨmbi manɨman muvatɨŋ ŋguramɨrɨman vamba ambɨrɨmandɨ. Kamavata nuŋ ŋguramɨrɨmandɨ. Harɨm yi narɨŋ kandɨ ambin, kru kandɨhamandu avihɨmɨŋgɨm ha manziŋgundɨrɨmandɨ, mɨŋɨmandɨ, vami.
